text: How do yâ€™all transfer workflows and properties created in a sandbox portal to another live portal? There a way to do it without the API?

You're sure you're using a test account or are you just using a normal account for testing. If it's the latter you'll need to set published to true. As long as you're the only one with this app installed no one will see a change
Yeah I can see it in my connected apps on the test account I just cant find the workflow action? I am wondering if there are certain scopes I need to add that I am missing?
I am gonna try published too though
Yeah you can see the app because the app is installed the action is all install you just can't see it because the published is set to false
published false actions will just show up in developer sandbox accounts
Let me know if you need any more help
